sections.paragraph: + An officer left as viceroy, 2 Macc. 4:31, in Antioch by Antiochus Epiphanes during his absence. 2 Macc. 4:31-38. (B.C. 171.) + Another officer of Antiochus Epiphanes who was left by him on Garizem. 2 Macc. 5:23. + A Christian at Rome, saluted by St. Paul, (Romans 16:7) together with Junia.
